### Invitation to Tender

**Project Title:** Investigation of Optical Signal from Biological, Chemical, Simulant and Interferent Materials

**Reference Number:** WS3699709682-Doc3851316178
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Publication Date:** February 10, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** March 15, 2023 at 14:00 HNE (EST)

**Contract Background:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) is issuing this Invitation to Tender (ITT) for the study of the phenomenology of optical and infrared signals from chemical and biological materials for Valcartier Research Center.

**Project Scope:**
The study aims to investigate the optical and infrared signals from various biological, chemical, simulant and interferent materials for a specific research project at Valcartier Research Center.

**Key Details:**

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Submission Method:** All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted electronically before the tender closing date.
* **Evaluation Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Additional Information:**

* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Quebec
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information:** For further information and bid documentation, please contact Daniel Boisclair at daniel.boisclair@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

You can view the Invitation to Tender document at the following URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15278738?extsite=MTUyNzg3MzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
